about_the_game:
• Switch constantly between multiple pilots or commit to one as a challenge.
  • Do trade and hauling, carry goods between stations.
  • Make investments in corporations which you can also join and benefit from their rise.
  • Climb the factional pyramid, reach higher ranks to have a bigger sway in politics, but be careful, higher the rank you are, bigger target you become.
  • Level up and increase your many skills, specialize int the ways you want.
  • Gear up, bigger guns, better bullets, faster ships, battle drones, get ready for bigger and more dangerous battles.
  • Perform salvaging operations by yourself or through using specialized drones, make returns with minimal risk.
  • Mine asteroids, sell or refine materials, craft goods.
  • Inflict the barren planets with biolife against the will of the Emperor, practice the Iskhaari religion.
  • Contract freelancer pilots to work for you in trading, hauling, mining, combat operations.
  • Install ship mods to have more unique abilities, ailments on your bullets, short distance warping, automated guns and many more.
  • Hack ships, stations, buildings and companies to steal or cause harm.

* Early in developement, features & mechanics are subject to changes.
detailed_description:
• Switch constantly between multiple pilots or commit to one as a challenge.
  • Do trade and hauling, carry goods between stations.
  • Make investments in corporations which you can also join and benefit from their rise.
  • Climb the factional pyramid, reach higher ranks to have a bigger sway in politics, but be careful, higher the rank you are, bigger target you become.
  • Level up and increase your many skills, specialize int the ways you want.
  • Gear up, bigger guns, better bullets, faster ships, battle drones, get ready for bigger and more dangerous battles.
  • Perform salvaging operations by yourself or through using specialized drones, make returns with minimal risk.
  • Mine asteroids, sell or refine materials, craft goods.
  • Inflict the barren planets with biolife against the will of the Emperor, practice the Iskhaari religion.
  • Contract freelancer pilots to work for you in trading, hauling, mining, combat operations.
  • Install ship mods to have more unique abilities, ailments on your bullets, short distance warping, automated guns and many more.
  • Hack ships, stations, buildings and companies to steal or cause harm.

* Early in developement, features & mechanics are subject to changes.
name: Iskhaar3D

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and upper
  • Processor: 64-bit Architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX10 and Up Capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: An in-depth space and economy simulation meets simple twin-stick controls. Iskhaari people have been exiled by the Khanid Emperor to a contested region of the galaxy. Through the means of military, economy and politics conquer this region for the House of Iskhaar.
